text: This iPad would easily have the compute to run Julia, but I guess it’s not possible because of Apple?

elements.text: This iPad would easily have the compute to run Julia, but I guess it’s not possible because of Apple?

text: We don’t have an iOS build of Julia yet.  There is complexity around having a JIT compiler run in iOS due to security restrictions.  They are opening things up bit by bit though, so it may be possible now, hard to say.  We don’t have many iOS-knowledgable engineers right now (I’m probably one of the most knowledgable and most of my knowledge comes from >10 years ago) so if you know people who are interested in making something reasonable, we’d be happy to look into it, but until then it’s just going to stay on the back burner.

elements.text: We don’t have an iOS build of Julia yet.  There is complexity around having a JIT compiler run in iOS due to security restrictions.
